title: @Riot, About the pre-season changes Q&A
body: First of all, thanks a lot for the Q&A, I'm sure a lot of people will be happy about it, I just think 9am Tuesday may not be the best time to have it. People will have school/uni/work and you'll get a very small portion of the people on the forums asking questions.

replies.body: Bump, literally nothing but a downvote from someone who doesn't like me and it's gone off the "hot" page despite there being older threads with 0 replies.
